title: France panorama. [No. 67/01]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. The New Year, 1st January 1967 - the Diplomatic corp wish the President a Happy New Year. 2. Fashion - the surreal fashion world of 1967, including the infamous “canned dress”. Includes Paco Rabanne’s Parisian workshop. 3. Toulouse future capital of science and research - shows Toulouse and the largest scientific settlement in Europe.
